weaviate.grpcPort.label: Weaviate gRPC Port
weaviate.grpcPort.help: gRPC port for Weaviate. Defaults to 50051 if REST is on 8080, otherwise REST port + 1.

weaviate.apiKey.label: Weaviate API Key
weaviate.apiKey.help: API key for Weaviate Cloud or authenticated instances

embedding.provider.label: Embedding Provider
embedding.provider.help: Use 'openai' for OpenAI API embeddings or 'weaviate' to use Weaviate's built-in vectorizer

embedding.apiKey.label: OpenAI API Key
embedding.apiKey.help: API key for OpenAI embeddings (required if provider is 'openai')

embedding.model.label: Embedding Model
embedding.model.help: OpenAI embedding model to use (ignored if provider is 'weaviate')

extraction.baseUrl.label: Extraction LLM Base URL
extraction.baseUrl.help: OpenAI-compatible API base URL. Use http://localhost:11434/v1 for Ollama, http://localhost:1234/v1 for LM Studio. Leave empty for OpenAI API.

extraction.apiKey.label: Extraction API Key
extraction.apiKey.help: API key for the extraction LLM. Not needed for Ollama/LM Studio. Falls back to embedding.apiKey if unset.

extraction.model.label: Extraction Model
extraction.model.help: Model for memory extraction (e.g. gpt-4o-mini, llama3.2, qwen2.5-coder, gemma2)

extraction.maxTokens.label: Extraction Max Tokens
extraction.maxTokens.help: Max tokens for extraction LLM response

autoCapture.label: Auto-Capture
autoCapture.help: Automatically capture important information from conversations

autoRecall.label: Auto-Recall
autoRecall.help: Automatically inject relevant memories into context
